publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-265.1 Carolyn Leckie: Queen Mother's Hospital and Yorkhill Hospital, Glasgowâ€”As an amendment to motion (S2M-265) in the name of Ms Sandra White, leave out "these hospitals" and insert "the full range of maternity services, including intrapartum and paediatric care, at all maternity facilities in Glasgow".
